mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a color photographic copy of an older photograph. It's a formal portrait with two women standing behind a woman who is seated and holding a small child. The back of the photograph includes handwritten notes: "Nannie Walker, 'Aunt Nin', Cousin Nell Lewis, Hettie Walker, James H. Lewis."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portrait with Infant James H. Lewis (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wood, Nannie Walker
African Americans -- Portraits
Virginia -- Lexington
Twentieth century
Lewis, James H.
